body: I'm Meowfrees, but you can call me Meow or Rag (what my best friends call me :P). I've been playing on this server for a while. I usually play with my best friend Evocal mostly on Avicade or Nebula (even though I'm not very good at PVP), and I've helped Evo make a few maps (I think two maps). My favorite game mode has to be Avicade, and I love Minecraft, Attack on Titan, Homestuck, TF2, and many other things that I cannot think of right now. Evocal convinced me to make this post, so what's up Avicus? :}
